com.artemis

Class EntitySubscription

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.artemis.EntitySubscription

  • public class EntitySubscription
extends Object
    Maintains the list of entities matched by an aspect. Entity subscriptions are automatically updated during World.process(). Any | listeners are informed when entities are added or removed.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  EntitySubscription.SubscriptionExtra 
      static interface  EntitySubscription.SubscriptionListener
      This interfaces reports entities inserted or removed when matched against their EntitySubscription

      Returns the bitset tracking all matched entities.

    • Method Detail

      • getEntities

        public IntBag getEntities()
        Returns a reference to the bag holding all matched entities.

        Warning: Never remove elements from the bag, as this will lead to undefined behavior.

        Returns:
        View of all active entities.

      • getActiveEntityIds

        public BitSet getActiveEntityIds()
        Returns the bitset tracking all matched entities.

        Warning: Never toggle bits in the bitset, as this may lead to erroneously added or removed entities.

        Returns:
        View of all active entities.

      • getAspect

        public Aspect getAspect()
        Returns:
        aspect used for matching entities to subscription.

      • getAspectBuilder

        public Aspect.Builder getAspectBuilder()
        Returns:
        aspect builder used for matching entities to subscription.

      • addSubscriptionListener

        public void addSubscriptionListener(EntitySubscription.SubscriptionListener listener)
        Add listener interested in changes to the subscription.
        Parameters:
        listener - listener to add.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
